original_text: When the king heard the woman's words, he was very upset. He tore his clothes. As he walked along the wall, people could see what he was wearing. They saw that he was wearing sackcloth under his other clothes.
korean_text: 왕이 그 여인의 말을 듣고 자기 옷을 찢으니라 그가 성 위로 지나갈 때에 백성이 본즉 그의 속살에 굵은 베를 입었더라

sentences.original_text: When the king heard the woman's words
sentences.korean_translation: 왕이 그 여자의 말을 들었을 때

people could see what he was wearing
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그가 무엇을 입고 있는지 볼 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: They saw that he was wearing sackcloth
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 보니 그는 굵은 베옷을 입고 있었습니다
그의 다른 옷 아래에 입고 있었습니다
